Sentencas: NiO-Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (Ni-SDC) composite anode powders are synthesized with a hydrothermal technique.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The average size of the particles in the anode powder is about 10 nm.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Different phases distribute uniformly in the composite.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode sintered at 700 degrees C exhibits an electrical conductivity of above 100 S cm(-1), three orders of magnitude higher than that of a similar solid-mixed composite anode with the same composition.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode synthesized through the hydrothermal process also possesses a higher catalytic activity.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An SDC-carbonate composite electrolyte-supported single cell with the composite anode exhibits a maximum power density of 738 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C with H2 as fuel, much higher than that of a similar cell with a solid-mixed anode.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell also exhibits a promising stability with methanol as fuel.
Titulo: Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Hydrothermally synthesized NiO-samarium doped ceria nano-composite as an anode material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
